contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Issei Miyazaki'''|宮崎 一成|Miyazaki Issei|born May 31, 1971 in [[Asaminami-ku, Hiroshima|Asaminami]], [[Hiroshima]], [[Hiroshima Prefecture|Hiroshima]]}} is a Japanese [[Seiyū|voice actor]]. He is the member of TAB Production. ==Notable voice roles== *Gen in ''[[Barefoot Gen (anime)|Barefoot Gen]]'' *[[Takashi Yamazaki]] in ''[[Cardcaptor Sakura]]'' *Kenji Ninomiya in ''[[Kamichu!]]'' *[[Subaru Sumeragi]] in ''[[X (1996 film)|X/1999]]'' *Jun Misugi in ''[[Captain Tsubasa]] (Road to 2002) *Sin in ''[[Guilty Gear 2: Overture]]'' *Ichirō Sumishiba in ''[[Dragon Drive]]'' *'''Naoya Shirakawa''' in ''[[Love Mode]]'' ==External links== * {{ann|people|3064}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Miyazaki, Issei | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese voice actor | DATE OF BIRTH = 1971 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Miyazaki, Issei}} [[Category:1971 births]] [[Category:81 Produce]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Hiroshima]] [[Category:Japanese voice actors]] {{Japan-voice-actor-stub}}
